name: Maze of time
description:
"Maze of time" - is a time manipulation puzzle game. You can travel or instantly move into the past or future, freeze time and interact with objects. The game was inspired by the game "Portal" and was created for Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

It's my first finished game ever, so don't forget to rate it and give your feedback in the comments. if you find a bug, please let me know immediately. They will be removed instantly.

Sorry for the possible bad grammar, English is not my mother language.
